content: {"name": "Louise Pantry at Nazareth Housing - Bronx", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Text \u201c**Food**\u201d to **726879**, come to the office, or call the office **(646) 713-2739** directly to make an appointment.", "email": "", "url": "https://nazarethhousingnyc.org/louises-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "406 East 184th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10458", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8563985, "longitude": -73.894757}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 713-2739", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "14:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
